CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(ASYMBL_Time__Status__c, "Approved"), IMAGE("/resource/ASYMBL_Time__AsymblTimeResources/AsymblTimeResources/images/Timesheet_Status_Approved.svg", "Approved", 30, 70), IF(ISPICKVAL(ASYMBL_Time__Status__c, "Draft"), IMAGE("/resource/ASYMBL_Time__AsymblTimeResources/AsymblTimeResources/images/Timesheet_Status_Draft.svg", "Draft", 30, 70), IF(ISPICKVAL(ASYMBL_Time__Status__c, "New"), IMAGE("/resource/ASYMBL_Time__AsymblTimeResources/AsymblTimeResources/images/Timesheet_Status_New.svg", "New", 30, 70), IF(ISPICKVAL(ASYMBL_Time__Status__c, "Rejected"), IMAGE("/resource/ASYMBL_Time__AsymblTimeResources/AsymblTimeResources/images/Timesheet_Status_Rejected.svg", "Rejected", 30, 70), IF(ISPICKVAL(ASYMBL_Time__Status__c, "Approved by Branch"), IMAGE("/resource/ASYMBL_Time__AsymblTimeResources/AsymblTimeResources/images/Timesheet_Status_Branch_Approved.svg", "Approved by Branch", 30, 120) , IMAGE("/resource/ASYMBL_Time__AsymblTimeResources/AsymblTimeResources/images/Timesheet_Status_Submitted.svg", "Submitted for Approval", 30, 70))))))
CustomField.label: Status
